name: 3D Rescue City Ambulance Parking Simulator
description:
Calling All EMS Responders! Pick up and drop off accident victims. Get through the level and park at the parking spot at the end. Use money to upgrade your vehicle for better performance. 5 realistic Rescue Vehicles to choose from. If you beat all the levels it unlocks 2 sandbox levels for unlimited free play.

[IMPORTANT: Due to high quality 3D graphics, this game may not work on older devices]

Features:
• Huge City in day or night conditions
• 10 challenging levels
• 3 Realistic Rescue Vehicles
• Upgrade system, upgrade your engine and handling
• Pick up and drop off victims to earn money
• Video replay – Share your experience with your friends


Compatiblity Information: Due to high quality 3D graphics and level size, this game requires 1024 mb of ram and may not run on older devices. Recommended iPad 3 and up, iPad Mini 2 and up and iPhone 5 and up.
